title: What is Troupe
desc: Troupe is a messaging platform, simple as that. Send messages, multimedia and more. Keep up with your friends and circle!

title: Why is Troupe Free
desc: Troupe is free because frankly, this is a personal project meant to show proficiency in certain technologies

title: What technologies were used to build this?
desc: MERN stack - React, Express, MongoDB and NodeJS. AWS services were used for multimedia management.

title: Where can I find System Design details?
desc: System Design details can be found at the GitHub repository. There are details on packages used, code implementation, Socket.io implementation and much more
